function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Arranging objects in circular or elliptic rooms may create congestion and limit airflow, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak due to limited airflow and congestion in crowded circular or elliptic rooms.","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems and airflow optimization strategies to improve air circulation and reduce congestion. Enforcing strict occupancy limits to prevent overcrowding in circular or elliptic rooms.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, airflow simulation software, social distancing monitoring technologies.","People":"Occupants of circular or elliptic rooms, building occupants, airline passengers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, airlines."}]}
